markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Brush Thylacine](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2204)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These ferociously territorial thylacines often attack creatures without provocation, and they are prone to leaving barely eaten carcasses strewn about their territories as additional markers of their dominance.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Brush Thylacine](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2204)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 609</row>

**Perception** +8; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 30

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +10 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Hunting Cry** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The thylacine growls, hisses, and bares its jaws in a frightening manner as it attempts to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) a creature. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check, and the attempt is not penalized if the target can't understand the thylacine.

**Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  The brush thylacine Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the brush thylacine began this action [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-321" />
name: Brush Thylacine

text: Brush Thylacine These ferociously territorial thylacines often attack creatures without provocation, and they are prone to leaving barely eaten carcasses strewn about their territories as additional markers of their dominance. Recall Knowledge - Animal (Nature): DC 18 Unspecific Lore : DC 16 Specific Lore : DC 13 Brush Thylacine Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 609 Perception +8; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Skills Athletics +8, Intimidation +6, Stealth +8, Survival +6 Str +4 Dex +2 Con +3 Int -4 Wis +2 Cha +0 --- AC 18 Fort +9 Ref +10 Will +6 HP 30 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action jaws +10 (deadly 1d8), Damage 1d6+6 piercing Hunting Cry Single Action (Auditory, Emotion, Mental) The thylacine growls, hisses, and bares its jaws in a frightening manner as it attempts to Demoralize a creature. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to this Intimidation check, and the attempt is not penalized if the target can't understand the thylacine. Pounce Single Action The brush thylacine Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the brush thylacine began this action hidden, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.
